title: Ultraviolet
description: Once upon a time there was a girl who was special.This is not her story.Unless you count the part where I killed her.Sixteen-year-old Alison has been sectioned in a mental institute for teens, having murdered the most perfect and popular girl at school. But the case is a no body has been found, and Alison's condition is proving difficult to diagnose. Alison herself can't explain what one minute she was fighting with Tori - the next she disintegrated. Into nothing. But that's impossible. Right?
author: R.J. Anderson
